citations.narrative:
The following recordkeeping items were noted. The record of the animals on hand was not up to date, dates of disposition
were not recorded for several animals no longer on the premises, and the disposition records for some of the animals sold
were not available at the time of the inspection.
Per this Section of the Regulations, dealers shall make and maintain complete records regarding the details of the
acquisition and disposition of animals in their possession in order to account for all animal transfers, dispositions, and
acquisitions. The animal records need to be updated and the animal records need to be kept current for all future animal
acquisitions and dispositions. Correct by 1/29/24.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with Licensee.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The following recordkeeping items were noted. The record of the animals on hand was not up to date, dates of disposition 
were not recorded for several animals no longer on the premises, and the disposition records for some of the animals sold 
were not available at the time of the inspection. 
 
Per this Section of the Regulations, dealers shall make and maintain complete records regarding the details of the 
acquisition and disposition of animals in their possession in order to account for all animal transfers, dispositions, and 
acquisitions. The animal records need to be updated and the animal records need to be kept current for all future animal 
acquisitions and dispositions. Correct by 1/29/24. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with Licensee.  
 
*END OF REPORT*
